text: NBC was a Taiwanese pay television owned by NBCUniversal International Networks. The channel launched as Telemundo on 8 February 1993 and aired Telemundo shows dubbed in Mandarin Chinese. The channel was relaunched as NBC on 25 January 2014. The channel aired shows from the US NBC in Mandarin Chinese. The channel ceased broadcasting on 25 May 2025. Category:Telemundo Category:NBC Category:Television channels in Asia
title: NBC (Taiwanese TV channel)
